references.paper_title: The optimum choice of the instant for stopping a Markov process
references.reason: This paper introduces the classical secretary problem, which is the foundation for the learning-augmented secretary problem studied in the current paper.
This paper introduces the learning-augmented secretary problem, which is the main focus of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Secretary and online matching problems with machine learned advice
references.reason: This paper is one of the few existing works that studies learning-augmented online algorithms with predictions, providing a baseline for comparison with the proposed work.

references.paper_title: Online metric algorithms with untrusted predictions
references.reason: This paper also studies learning-augmented online algorithms with predictions, offering another relevant baseline for comparison.
This paper studies online algorithms with distributional advice, providing context and related work to the study of learning-augmented algorithms with predictions.
